overview: What would you do if you could record your dreams? Paul has invented a machine that allows him to do just that. When there is a mishap Paul gets stuck in the dreamworld and the only way out is to battle the lord of nightmares. SOVHORROR is pleased to present for the first time on DVD John Bowkerâ€™s ambitious S.O.V. fantasy epic Dreamwalkers.
title: Dreamwalkers
